name: Children's Ministry
body_content: IBC has Sunday school classes for your children at 10AM (led by their respective Sunday school teachers). IBC also provides a loving nursery for your infants and toddlers during all services.

name: Evangelistic Outreach
body_content: Weekly, IBC reaches Delano and its neighboring communities with the authentic gospel of Christ.  A group of volunteers knock on doors each week with a heart ready to preach the gospel to any and all who will hear.

name: Music Program
body_content: IBC has a choir that performs during offering time. Sometimes, the choir performs as a whole, and sometimes, certain members of the choir perform as soloists, duets, trios, or quartets.
